interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  2  to unlock this Event.
interactivity.to_get_this_event: This Event will occur automatically on or after Day 2. Autoplays after " A New You " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Every Day I Grow Some More " .

progression.synopsis: Sensei has a dream about Ami , one that makes little sense to him. Afterwards, he wakes up to find Ami by his bedside, who tells him to get ready for school.
trivia: This event shares its name with a song from the game's Soundtrack . Despite this, the aforementioned song does not play during the event.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.1.
